name: unifid

body.origin:
|- wceq(cunif, cslot(cfv(cunif, cnx)))
-| wceq(cunif, cslot(cdc(nat1, nat3)))

⊢ UnifSet = Slot((UnifSet ` ndx))
⊣ UnifSet = Slot(cdc(1, 3))
⊣ cdc(1, 3)∈ ℕ
